nodes.title: The Question
nodes.story: You're cuddled on the couch when they turn to you, serious expression on their face. 'Where is this going? I need to know if we're heading toward forever or just passing time.' Your stomach drops.

choices.text: 'I'm not ready to think about forever'
'Can we talk about this another time?'

nodes.title: Moving Forward
nodes.story: Their face lights up. 'Really?' They pull you into a passionate kiss. 'I've been waiting to hear that. Let's start looking at apartments together next weekend.'

nodes.title: The Distance
nodes.story: They pull away physically. 'So this is just a fling for you?' Their voice is cold. 'I've been planning my future around you.'

nodes.title: Avoidance
nodes.story: They get up from the couch. 'You always do this. Every time things get real, you run.' They grab their jacket. 'I need some space.'

nodes.title: Apartment Hunting
nodes.story: You're viewing a perfect little place together. 'Our first home,' they whisper, squeezing your hand. The reality of commitment hits you.

nodes.title: Mixed Signals
nodes.story: 'First you say forever, then you say slow down. Which is it?' They look hurt and confused. 'I need consistency, not hot and cold.'

nodes.title: Moving In Together
nodes.story: The first night in your new place. Boxes everywhere, takeout on the floor. They kiss you. 'Our life starts now.'

nodes.title: Breaking Up
nodes.story: The truth comes out: you're not ready. There are tears, shouting, then silence. They pack their things. 'I hope you find what you're looking for.'

nodes.title: Taking a Break
nodes.story: You agree to separate for a month. No contact. Time to think. The silence is both painful and freeing.

choices.text: See what happens after the break
